Translations.Text: D Nekwni, s tidep, i k id Issersen Leqwoan, s lmizan
Eubeo i ueuddu n Mass ik; segsen, ur teccev, ur jehhel
Mmekti d isem n Mass ik, tafrara, tameddit
Deg iv, knu yaS, u sbuccaa iT tallit $wezzifen
Ih, wigi eemmlen taeemmaqt, stehzan deg wass amoay
Nekwni Nxelq iten, Nesseohed i$san nnsen. Ma ihwa yaÂ£, a Nerr ay ten icban, wakali, deg umkan nnsen
Wagi, s tidep, d asmekti. Win ib$an, ad iddem abrid ar Mass is
Ur tbeqqum, siwa ma Ib$a Oebbi. Oebbi, s tidep, d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Win i S ihwan, a t Issekcem ar ueunu S; ma d imednas, Ihegga yasen aaaqeb aqeoean
